    • Uses of MenuItem in businessLayer

      Subclasses of MenuItem in businessLayer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BaseProduct
      Class for extending the MenuItem with a base product containing the name and price
      class  CompositeProduct
      Class for the Composite product that extends MenuItem and saves in an array the base and the comp product with their prices using the Composite Pattern
